# TriFused - AI-Native Technology Services

> TriFused delivers enterprise-grade cybersecurity, autonomous infrastructure, and AI-powered growth solutions for modern businesses.

## About TriFused

TriFused is an AI-native technology services company specializing in:

- **Cybersecurity Solutions**: Advanced penetration testing, MDR & threat hunting, SIEM/EDR monitoring
- **Infrastructure Services**: Secure workstations, cloud systems (Azure, AWS, Office 365), database architecture
- **Identity & Access Management**: Password protection, multi-factor authentication, account security
- **Data Services**: Server monitoring, data insights, 30-minute system recovery
- **AI Development**: LLM integration, autonomous agents, generative AI applications
- **Growth Engineering**: AI-powered marketing, personalized customer journeys

## Our Ventures

TriFused operates a portfolio of technology ventures:

- **Spacevana** (spacevana.com) - Space technology and innovation platform
- **Logeyeball** (logeyeball.com) - Visual monitoring and analytics
- **LeadKik** (leadkik.com) - Lead generation and customer acquisition
- **CloneWarden** (clonewarden.com) - Digital identity protection
- **TechizUp** (techizup.com) - Technology news and reviews

## Services

### Security Services
- Secure Workstations: Latest software and security updates
- Advanced Security: SIEM and EDR tools with AI-powered threat detection
- Advanced Pen-Testing: Offensive security protocols
- MDR & Threat Hunting: Managed detection and response

### Infrastructure Services
- Cloud Systems: Office 365, Microsoft Azure, Amazon AWS management
- Cloud & Database Architecture: High-availability database clusters
- Mobile Device Management: Secure endpoint administration
- Your Data Your Services: Advanced monitoring with 30-minute recovery

### Development Services
- AI-Native Development: LLM integration and autonomous agents
- Generative Growth Engines: AI-powered marketing strategies

## Contact

For inquiries, use the contact form on our website or reach out through our client portal.

## Technical Stack

Built with React, TypeScript, Express.js, PostgreSQL, and Tailwind CSS.
